title: GetFLV 9.6.5.3 + Loader (CRACKED) [WORKING]
description:
PLEASE NOTE: It likes to detect it as a false positive. 




GetFLV 9.6.5.3 Final



Description:

GetFLV is a powerful and reliable application designed to turn your PC into a FLV studio. It helps you download and manage FLV Video Files. With this tool, you are able to download the FLV movies you like and save them to your hard drive for future playback.
You can convert FLV files to regular video files. It will help you extract FLV Audio to mp3 or other audio format. The application can also repair the FLV video files that can't be seeked.


Benefits:

*Download ANY Web Video to your PC in mere minutes
*Support Hundreds Video Sites including: Youtube, HuLu, MTV, CBS...
*Convert ANY videos for your portable devices like iPod, iPhone, PSP, Zune, etc. devices
*Convert ANY Video to FLV and put it on ANY web site


Features:

imageGrab Web Video URL flawlessly
Simply launch the FLV browser, and visit your favorite video site. Select and play a video, and click "download" to save it to your local disk.

imageDownload Web Video flawlessly
GetFLV dramatically reduces the download time of Web Videos. The program splits the file into sections, and downloads multiple sections simultaneously, efficiently.

imageConvert Any Web Videos
It's simple to convert any web video to MP4, WMV, 3GP, AVI and MOV formats. After conversion, you can watch your movies on any of your computers or portable devices.

imageConvert other videos to Flash
GetFLV can convert any of these popular video formats into Flash files. It supports almost all types of video formats such as AVI, WMV, MOV, ASF, MP4, 3GP and etc.


imageExtract music from Web Video
GetFLV's built-in audio ripper can extract the music track from any web video and save as MP3, WMA, AAC and other popular music formats.

imageRepair damaged Flash movie
GetFLV can repair damaged Flash movies. The built-in FLV Fixer and MetaData Injector will analyze and repair Flash files that won't play properly.


Instructions:

01. Download ENTIRE Torrent (including Keygen + Loader. DON'T LET YOUR ANTIVIRUS 
DELETE THESE!)
02. Navigate to the folder 'C:WindowsSystem32driversetc' and open the file 
called 'hosts' in a text editor. 
03. Add the following lines to the host file:
127.0.0.1 localhost 
127.0.0.1 www.vdigger.com
127.0.0.1 www.getflv.com

04. Save the hosts file. (Be sure to NOT save it as a .txt. Save it as 'hosts' 
with NO filetype!)
05. Replace old hosts file with new one (if you couldn't save it directly)
06. Install GetFLV from the 'gf2setup.exe' file.
07. Copy the loader from the 'LOADER' folder into the installation location for 
GetFLV
08. !!MAKE SURE YOUR ANTIVIRUS IS OFF! IT WILL DELETE THE LOADER!!
09. Launch the loader with admin privileges
10. A pop-up box will say 'this is a search and replace loader' blah blah blah. 
Just press OK and DON'T CLICK ANYTHING. Just wait for a minute or two.
11. A pop-up box will say 'offsets found! Please restart loader'. Do what it says.
12. After loading a second time, press the register box (should pop up this time 
you load the program)
13. Open the 'Keygen.exe' file and enter your email or a fake one. Doesn't matter. 
(or you can use the one provided in the notes section)
14. Copy and paste the email and serial number into the registration box in GetFLV.
15. Press 'Register'.
16. Program will say 'Thanks for registering' blah blah blah. 
17. You now have the full version of GetFLV 9.6.5.3. 
18. To update, you have to uninstall the old version, delete the entire GetFLV 
folder and then install a fresh copy. DO NOT SAVE THE OFFSETS FILE! Delete it!
